actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Horticulture, Research, Biotechnology, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: To provide grants to enhance the most effective freezing methods to improve access to affordable and locally produced specialty crops.
short_title: Preserving Healthy Food for the Hungry Act

summary.text: Preserving Healthy Food for the Hungry Act - Amends the Agricultural Risk Protection Act of 2000 to provide agricultural product market development grants to assist persons in preserving the quality and shelf-life of fruit and vegetable crops produced by such persons on qualified land through the use of mobile and fixed flash freezing and quick freezing units.

titles.title: Preserving Healthy Food for the Hungry Act
To provide grants to enhance the most effective freezing methods to improve access to affordable and locally produced specialty crops.
